title: Phoenix Zoo
summary: The Phoenix Zoo opened in 1962 and is the largest privately owned, non-profit zoo in the United States.[5] Located in Phoenix, Arizona, the zoo was founded by Robert Maytag,[6] a member of the Maytag family, and operates on 125 acres (51Â ha) of land in the Papago Park area of Phoenix.[1] It has been designated as a Phoenix Point of Pride.[5]
